title: CREEM: America's Only Rock 'N' Roll Magazine
description: Between 1969 and 1988, 'Creem' magazine stood at the forefront of youth counterculture with its brazen slogan 'America's only rock 'n' roll magazine'. This title presents a retrospective of the beautiful haze that was rock's golden age, from the end of the hippies through glam and punk, and into 80's heavy metal.
author: Robert Matheu
